bibl.title: The Derveni Papyrus and the Bacchic-Orphic Epistomia.
Poetry as Initiation. The Center for Hellenistic Studies Symposium on the Derveni Papyrus

bibl.note: Voir en part.: Appendix. Reproduit la discussion consacrée au papyrus de Derveni lors de la réunion de l'American Society of Papyrologists à Philadelphie, le 24 août 1964, publiée dans: BASP 2 (1964-1965) pp. 15-23 [interventions de Eric G. Turner, Georges Daux, Bernard A. van Groningen, Claire Préaux, Charles B. Welles, Herbert C. Youtie, Kurt von Fritz, Hugh Lloyd-Jones, Frank W. Walbank, Ronald Syme, Herbert Musurillo].
bibl.seg: Yannis Z. Tzifopoulos, The Derveni Papyrus and the Bacchic-Orphic Epistomia.

Ioanna Papadopoulou & Leonard Muellner (edd.), Poetry as Initiation. The Center for Hellenistic Studies Symposium on the Derveni Papyrus = Hellenistic Studies Series. 63 (Cambridge, Mass., 2014) pp. 135-164.
